This library provides a communication interface with the linux netfilter firewall for management, logging and connection tracking.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
net.sf.iptablesJava.connection
Provides an interface for listening to conntrack connection events.
net.sf.iptablesJava.log
Provides an interface for listening to firewall log events reported by netfilter.
net.sf.iptablesJava.rules
Provide an interface for generation, parsing and application of iptables rules.
This library provides a communication interface with the linux netfilter firewall for management, logging and connection tracking.

The rule manager allows to parse, generate and apply the iptables rules to the local linux machine.
The log tracker provides a java notification system for low level netfilter log events.
The connection tracker notifies for established connections and connection state changes.
